languages.text: "Эй, я видела тебя в питейной на нижних палубах, булыжник! Даже арбитрам иногда надо расслабляться, да?"
"Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
languages.original_text: "Эй, я видела тебя в питейной на нижних палубах, булыжник! Даже арбитрам иногда надо расслабляться, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar in the lower decks, hard man! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
"Don't think I didn't see you in the bar in the lower decks, hard man! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
"Don't think I didn't see you in the bar in the lower decks, hard man! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
"Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
"Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

languages.text: 「下層デッキの酒場であなたを見かけなかったとでも思ってる？堅物マスター！アービトレイターだって、たまには羽を伸ばさなきゃでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキの酒場であなたを見かけなかったとでも思ってる？堅物マスター！アービトレイターだって、たまには羽を伸ばさなきゃでしょ？」

languages.text: "Glaubt nicht, ich hätte nicht in der Bar auf den unteren Decks nicht gesehen, Meister Spielverderber! Selbst Arbitratoren müssen gelegentlich entspannen, richtig?"
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt nicht, ich hätte nicht in der Bar auf den unteren Decks nicht gesehen, Meister Spielverderber! Selbst Arbitratoren müssen gelegentlich entspannen, richtig?"

languages.text: « Dites donc, maître Rabat-joie, je vous ai vu au bar des ponts inférieurs ! Comme quoi, même les arbitrators ont besoin de se détendre de temps en temps, hein ? »
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites donc, maître Rabat-joie, je vous ai vu au bar des ponts inférieurs ! Comme quoi, même les arbitrators ont besoin de se détendre de temps en temps, hein ? »

languages.text: «¡No crea que no le vi en el bar de las cubiertas inferiores, maese aguafiestas! Hasta los Arbitrator se sueltan la melena de vez en cuando, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No crea que no le vi en el bar de las cubiertas inferiores, maese aguafiestas! Hasta los Arbitrator se sueltan la melena de vez en cuando, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “你也去过底层甲板的酒吧，泼冷水大师，别以为我没看到！看来，就算是法务官，偶尔也得放松一下，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"

traits.locale_text: “你也去过底层甲板的酒吧，泼冷水大师，别以为我没看到！看来，就算是法务官，偶尔也得放松一下，是吧？”

languages.text: "Seni alt güvertedeki barda görünce gözlerime inanamadım Oyunbozan Efendi! Demek ki Yargıcıların bile bazen kafayı boşaltmaları gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Don't think I didn't see you in the bar on the lower decks, Master Killjoy! Even Arbitrators need to let their hair down once in a while, right?"
